I giggled :)

Dear LiveJournal.

I am really fucked up.

Please shoot me.

Thankyou.

so....the Halloween Party was awesome. i wish i took pics. My sugarlips was so effing hot and adorable as Pencilious Von Kampft. Marcie was a cute and innocent witch. Junie was a girl from the movie Sweet Sixteen...or was it Sixteen Candles?? i dont know, you know june and her movies ;-) and she was pretty. I think Ami was a purple tinkerbell. Tricia was a PapaJohn's delivery driver... haha. (when i first saw her i thought she was Bill ;-O) Laura was an awesome vampire fairy. Dean had kool demon horns. James was a Samurai Warrior and brought a real sword to work...asshat. Will Kane was Captain Nintendo!!! everytime i think about him i laugh. no offense will, you just remind me how much i love my dorky brother-in-law. ;-) Will Johnson tried on Morty's hot dog suit and joey mask but didn't wear it for long. Morty was Joey before I showed up. And Sean, well...i feel bad cuz he got stuck at work but he came home and got drunk with the rest of us!!!  Yeah, i downed like 3 1/2 glasses of alcohol and was trashed. And YES I AM A LIGHT-WEIGHT but oh well...i had an awesome time. I just wish i was there when Will J shot the dots through the mail slot in the front door to the kids! i heard it was freaking hilarious. oh well. oh, i forgot about me. i was a cute goth school girl. i freaked out at first because i didn't think anything was going right, but everything went perfect, except for me falling around acting like a fool, but that's me!! ;-P i love hanging out with all the people i love, it just feels great. i always have a great time. lets hope that parties at the new house will continue. anyway, thank you everyone for being awesome! love u all!

And to my honey... thankyou for taking care of me, without you, i would've been on the front lawn ;-)  you're freakin awesome. i can't wait to spend the rest of my years with you. <3

im a bad friend.....


im sorry sean :-(
june?? what are ya'll up to tonight?
HAPPY 21st BIRTHDAY TO ME! HAPPY 21st BIRTHDAY TO ME! HAPPY 21st BIRTHDAY DEAR MEEE EEEEEE! HAPPY 21st BIRTHDAY TO ME! im gonna have an awesome birthday with everyone i love! yay!

i finally saw a chinchilla today! they are so funny lookin. they have a squirrels tail, mouse ears and the body of a rabbit. so weird...but cute at the same time. the center i went to today had two, a white and brown one. in the front room they had thousands of tadpoles in a very small aquarium. and a bunny rabbit in another room. lets just say that the animals brightened up my day cuz that center was hell! now i have to go back tomorrow for more! and it's gonna take twice as long! =(   well, gonna go eat some grapes...wow, thats so exciting! 

peace

We always think we'll have plenty of time to tell people we love them, so we end up not actually taking the time to do it. <3 That's why, Dad, I want to let you know what's in my heart- I love you. I've always loved you. And I always will. Happy Valentine's Day Love Always, Boopa xoxoxo

when i was a little girl, i use to get hit/beat ALOT for anything and everything, and shit i didn't even do. i had to deal with this for 10 1/2 years. "NIGGER LOVER! FAT BITCH! WHORE! SLUT! WHITE TRASH! TRAILER TRASH! YOU'RE GONNA BE JUST LIKE YOUR MOTHER, A FUCKING WHORE WHO WILL NEVER AMOUNT TO ANYTHING!" those are some of the words that i would hear everyday. whenever i heard that tone come from someone, i would always start crying and try to hide, cuz i knew that i was going to get a beaten. either choked against and up the wall until i lost the feeling in my toes, beaten til i couldn't feel my back anymore, or punched until i couldn't see. this would be a daily routine....until we left to come to maine, when i was 16. 
i never got read to when i was younger. i never had friends, except when i had to get along with the daughters of my mother's new boyfriend. i was never shown affection. i had to dream of things i wanted to do when i grew up and who i thought i wanted to be. i was a big dreamer.
i always told myself that i would never lie, cheat, or be a nobody. alot of good that did me. i have become what i swore myself i would never be.
i can't figure out who i am. because i have seen so many things, and have been through so many situations, i just dont know how to think for myself. i always have to have someone tell me what to do because that's what im use to. "dont tell wayne that we were over dave's, he'd kill me" "you better not say anything, or i'll beat the living shit out of you" "come on you stupid fucking bitch, if you break that tooth brush, im gonna make u clean that floor with you god damn tongue! now starting scrubbing, you low-life whore"
im so tired....
im just ready to give up
im going nowhere.
i never will
i will always be the child that never got a fair shot at life.

You are everyone's ideal friend because you are sincere and genuinely kind. Sometimes you worry about your friends' problems so much, you forget about your own responsibilities, which can get you into trouble. For you, it's the little things that really count. You also happen to be the main driver of the Cloud Car. No speeding!

last night i got this email to check out this website. i did. it is a website that has all of the pictures i took of the wedding a couple of weeks ago! and my pics are even better than hers! but the only downer is that she didn't recognize my work. its under her name, so she gets the credit. thats the only thing that bugged me. but oh well. i know my talent is there for everyone to see, and im proud of myself! for once.

here's the website: www.pictage.com

register first

then go to Pelletier Owen Wedding

over to the right, click on view all images

there, you will be able to view all the photos.

they're not labeled as mine, but i know which ones are mine.

so, if you'd like to know who's are who's, here's a list of numbers to go by when looking.....

<lj-cut text="click here">

34-37, 74, 75, 79, 80, 82-97, 106, 114, 116, 117, 120, 122, 123, 127, 132-142, 195, 199, 200, 258-260, 311-321, 360, 366, 376, 393, 398, 406-411, 436, 472-474, 477-490, 494-499, 504, 505

then go to unity: 74-97, 114-117, 120, 122, 133-142, and more...dont have time to post the rest.

i hope you all enjoyed the show!

She's tha best! 4.~Would or did swtkis4u1231 and swtkis4u1231 go out? uh......I know she loves herself but I don't think that much to go out with herself. 5.~Have you ever liked swtkis4u1231? well, let me think about it....duh. 6.~If humanerrorb1tch died tomorrow, what is one thing that you would need him/her to know? aaaaaaaawwwwwwwww......i would cry. i would tell her that she's a great person and she's one of my very good friends. 7.~Would marciegurl420 and swtkis4u1231 make a good couple? no...they don't swing that way. 8.~Describe swtkis4u1231 in 3 words: loving, awesome, crazy 9.~Do you think swtkis4u1231 is hot? i don't swing that way.....but she's my best friend, so sure. 10.~Would humanerrorb1tch and swtkis4u1231 make a lovely couple? same as #7 11.~What do you think of when you see swtkis4u1231? just got back from connecticut for the labor day weekend.

guess what i did.....

i "chilled" with my mother and my aunt.....it was the most hilarious thing i did this weekend. 

i saw my dad without "tha bitch". it was a very good visit. i can't even remember the last time my dad was away from that bitch. so i took the opportunity and had fun. i miss those days.

took pics....hope they come out good.

now just putting stuff away and waiting for june and will to come over...

gotta run....

pieces

Today is the day i've been waiting for for a very long time...

i've had glasses since i was 4 til now 19 almost 20.

NOT ANY MORE!!!

I, Meaghan LeFebvre, the bitch from Georgia, has contact lenses!

goodbye glasses, hello the new me!


(they feel weird though. it feels like i have about 1000 eyelashes stuck in my eyes and can't get them out) 

;)

today is the day that i go out into this world and give my best at what i do. there were some obsticles that i had to go through to get here but im here and im nervous as hell. what if i mess up their pictures? what if i get too hot and i have one of my episodes? i guess i gotta go with an open mind and not think about these things or i'll have a nervous breakdown by the time i get there; which is about a 2, 3 or 4 hour drive depending how you look at it. just waking up now and eating a donut, then getting ready for the big day ahead of me. hope i do well....wish me luck.

(but i won't get your good luck's until i get back...so i'll pretend that you already told me)

pieces,

a nervous-as-hell professional photographer

my mom had her surgery today...she's doin good. now she knows the pain i had to go through with mine. now i have to take care of her again.....this is number 5 i think. i think we were born in the wrong order, i should have been the mother and her the daughter. cuz ive been taking care of her for a long time now. i mentioned that to her and she just smiled.

im tired.

ive been up since 5 am. i was in Plastic and Hand for 8 hours. 

well, gotta get up in the morning and help mom.....then go to work....then homework and cleaning and everything else.


then me and june are going to a passion party....yay!!!

i just changed my background from charmed to aaliyah. it's very pretty.

worked today.....it went by very slow.
but now im home...yay!

why are people so mad at me?

this is to no one in general....but seriously, whatever i do, it's not good enough. i try and try and try to do what i think is right and i get nowhere. i can never do anything right in anyone's eyes. there's always something for me to get yelled at. no matter where i go...there's always negativity. and people want to know why im so negative all the time...well....my house has it, my whole family has it, school has it, work has it...and my bird...she's always sqwauking at me.

anyway...im tryin to be good with everyone. im tryin to be nice to everyone. i don't like being hated by other people and i don't like hating people. that's not how i want to live my life. i just want a life without all this shit in it...for once in my life!

anyway, gotta go.

pieces-meg
in firefighter uniform
according to some people: im hot............. but dumb. -whatever

back at school....on my way here i didn't know if i was happy to come back or if i was gonna dread it. we have some sick computers here. they're f-ing awesome! flat screen macs, oh they're so pretty. =) well, gotta go. write later.

-pieces

-meg

ps. june, i hope you handled that bitch. if not, i will, again.

love you

thanks to everyone who let me vent about my problems and tried to help me with them...

You Know You're From Georgia When...
Sweet tea is THE drink. No questions. When a waitress asks what you want to drink and you say Coke, she asks "What kind?" "Ya'll" is a word. Atlanta is known as "The City." You know the difference between a hillbilly, a redneck, and a Southerner. The one way to be killed in .5 seconds is to talk about somebody's mama or talk bad to somebody's mama. Krispy Kreme dounuts are the only kind of dounuts you eat. Fried chicken is a major part of your diet. When the Goverment started telling people to stock up on duck tape, you were waaaaaaaaaay ahead of them. You walk into someone's house and people are sitting around smoking what they call "the garden" On one side of the road there's Wal-Mart and on the other is a cotton field You greet people with"Howdy, Whachu doin?" You know what a 'dawg' is. You know people who consider a six pack and a bug zapper quality entertainment. The directions to your house include "turn off the paved road." Your dog and your wallet are both on chains. You still call the refrigerator the "icebox". You call it a cold Christmas if you don't break out in a sweat in your new sweater. Your whole town completely shuts down for 1 inch of snow or just the threat of snow You know at least three streets named "Peachtree" You don't know anyone who drinks Pepsi. The last thing you want to do is give another driver the finger... unless your car is armored, your trigger finger is itchy and your AK-47 has a full clip. It is not a shopping cart, it is a buggy. People actually grow, eat and like okra! You actually get these jokes and pass them on to other friends from Georgia.

haven't written in a while....

just thought i'd say....

LIFE IS GOOD...

LIFE IS REALLY GOOD




:tired: going home to the hell hole to get some shut eye before work

Friday was my rehearsal for graduation. i raced my friend Rusty on toilet racecars and i won. and i raced sarah through a blowup maze thing. well, the fabric caught my glasses and flung them across the maze thing; so i lost that one. and i have two skin burns; one on my right arm and one on my face. oh well, i had fun anyway.

Saturday was my dinner and dance. i looked super hot!! omg, i don't think i've ever looked that good. (no, im not conceited) the dinner was awesome and i danced my ass off. i had soooo much fun...after, i went home and went to sleep. had to be up at 7 to get ready for graduation. got home and called morty to wish him and marcy a happy 1 year anniversary! congrats guys!

Sunday, got up at 7, got ready (looked good again). drove to the whittemore center, near UNH. waited with my college friends until i saw my family. my mom, aunt, grandmother and her boyfriend, and my grandfather showed up. then about an hour later, junie showed up. and then it was time for walking. walked down the 40 steps to get to the bottom. walked and sat down where i sat for an hour and a half because people wouldn't shut the hell up! god! i didn't listen to a damn word they said. BLAH, BLAH, BLAH! and Andrew Card, the Secretary of State, talked for a damn hour and 10 minutes! damn you for making me stupider!

i kept looking up to see my family and june sitting there next to me cheering me on. and then ryan showed up. yay!  he looked so tired, everyone i knew sitting next to me was laughing cause he looked like he was gonna pass out. but it was all good. then it was time for me to walk up.......i was so nervous. my legs were shaking and i thought i was gonna fall cause i didn't eat anything before i went. the lady said my name right, i shook Andrew Card's hand and walked toward the back. a lady took my picture with me chewing my gum and looking at my fake diploma. it'll be a bad picture. had to walk to the back to get the professional pictures done. i look up and saw this lady waving at me and this guy next to her was standing up with a camera. i was like, who the hell is waving at me? so i looked behind me and there was noone there. 

"Meaghan! It's dad!"    OMG!!!!!!   i never thought in a million years that my dad would be there. of course the waterfalls turned on and i was the next one up to have my picture taken. and of course, it lookedlike shit. i didn't care, my dad was there!

after everything, everyone got together at Weathervane and had an awesome time. you couldn't even tell that they hate eachother, they got along so well. 

THAT WAS THE BEST GRADUATION EVER!  

and i received many gifts and $170!
($100 from my dad, $50 from my grandfather and $20 from my  grandmother and her boyfriend.)

i just want to say thankyou to everyone who came and made my day the best day of my life!

i love you guys!

i'm sorry for the rest who couldn't come.......though i was thinking about you.

ya, so i got up this morning and went to dots; a clothing store by market basket. i bought two outfits. cost me $49. they are so cute!!!  I'm gonna look so hot at the dance and graduation! I'm so excited!!  then me and my roommate, Heather, went to do some errands and we smoked. ya, so right now, i'm toasted! and i've been trying to drive. i've been so paranoid. its creepin me out. ya, so i lied about not doing it again....but, this is a graduation present for me; i derserve it. and we have to rehearse today for graduation!! i'm gonna freak out because i don't know what i'm doing. right now, i can barely understand what i'm writing. me and heather are going to her house in Lewiston tonight. we're gonna go in the hot tub (clothed) and we're gonna party. i deserve it all!!! well, gotta go. talk to ya later!
pieces- mg
